content.rendered:
WordCampNYC is this weekend, and we will be presenting on Saturday at 1pm. Our session, “PROVIDING INLINE HELP FOR A GREAT USER EXPERIENCE“, will highlight many of the new features in Piklist v0.9.9.x, and we’ll show you just how easy it is to customize the WordPress admin.

If you build websites for clients, then you will benefit from this session.

Hope to see you there!
